Player History
Drafted in 5th round, 49th overall pick, by Baltimore in 2019...
Traded from Baltimore to Toronto on 4/1/2019 (Going to BAL: LF Robert Garcia. Going to TOR: CF Nicholas Danos)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/1/2019, off Titus Cortright (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2019, off Dennis Mansour (OAK)...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/18/2019 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Won Conference Championship with Toronto in 2019...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/5/2020, hitting .524 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against New York on 7/14/2020...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/11/2020, hitting .375 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Sets a new season AL-Record for RBI with 128 on 9/17/2020...
Injured on 9/24/2020 with a Bruised Ribs, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 10/21/2020 with a Hyper Extended Knee, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won MVP in 2020, hitting .340 with 27 HR, 131 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Milwaukee on 6/4/2021...
Was selected to the 2021 Allstar game...
